metadata.title: CVE-2021-35306 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Bento4 through v1.6.0-636. A NULL pointer dereference exists in the function AP4_StszAtom::WriteFields located in Ap4StszAtom.cpp. It allows an attacker to cause a denial of service (DOS).

notes.note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
